description: Explore how Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) empower creators through new monetization avenues, enhanced creative possibilities, and improved audience engagement, while also addressing intellectual property protection and environmental considerations.
keywords: NFTs, Non-Fungible Tokens, creators, blockchain, monetization, intellectual property, audience engagement, art, eco-friendly, smart contracts
title: Unlocking New Horizons: The Benefits of NFTs for Creators
